model.name: wireTap
model.title: Wire Tap
model.description: Routes a copy of a message (or creates a new message) to a secondary destination while continue routing the original message.
model.label: eip,endpoint,routing

uri.description: Uri of the endpoint to use as wire tap

ref.description: Reference of the endpoint to use as wire tap

processorRef.description: Reference to a Processor to use for creating a new body as the message to use for wire tapping

body.description: Expression used for creating a new body as the message to use for wire tapping

copy.description: Uses a copy of the original exchange

onPrepareRef.description: Uses the Processor when preparing the org.apache.camel.Exchange to be send. This can be used to deep-clone messages that should be send or any custom logic needed before the exchange is send.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
